item.description:
Hello everyone!
This weekend we are hosting author and national speaker Mother Clare Watts, who will be visiting New Haven and presenting three powerful seminars on some spiritually inspiring topics. Mother Clare is a Master Teacher of the Mystical Christian tradition. She is a wise and dynamic speaker, not to be missed for those who are searching for something truly, spiritually meaningful and life-changing.
The second seminar of this weekend, presented Friday evening, is entitled

How to Have Peace of Mind - Worry-Free Days and Peaceful Nights
Learn to have the real peace of mind that comes from knowing the spiritual truths that we are masters of our minds and that life and God are good.

------------------------------------
About the presenter
Mother Clare Watts is a priest and Master Teacher of Christian Mysticism. She holds a Master's Degree in Counseling Psychology, with extensive post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, and worked as a Certified Professional Midwife for 18 years. She is the author of Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path to Enlightenment
